name: Neon Chroma
description:
A vibrant geometric 2D Platformer. The player gets to traverse through spiky traps, lava pits, and air vents as you progress through the game. 

1st year Sheridan College Game Design Project 

Enjoy!

Team: 
  • Sukhraj Johal - Programmer, Level Designer
  • Liam McAlinden - Level Designer
  • Dylan Souksombath - Level Designer
Controls: 

Keyboard Controls: 

  • A - Move Left 
  • D- Move Right
  • Spacebar - Jump 

Note: Audio and music used does not belong to us!
